title: Luminary Tour: Cezanne
short_description: Come together with fellow Luminary to enjoy a closer look at the groundbreaking retrospective Cezanne.
description:
On this guided small-group tour, join fellow Luminary to explore the groundbreaking retrospective Cezanne.

Open exclusively to Luminary members, this tour requires advance registration and is limited to twelve participants. The tour lasts approximately 50 minutes. View all upcoming Luminary programs.

So that you can enjoy your experience safely, all museum visiting policies at the time of the event must be observed.

Contact Us

If you have questions or are interested in learning more about Luminary membership, we’d be delighted to hear from you. Please contact us at (312) 443-3735 or luminary@artic.edu.
button_caption:
$50 per person

This tour is limited to twelve participants.
